title: Plugin: DOM interaction (click, fill, scroll)
description: Inject JS to click elements by ref, fill inputs, check/uncheck, select dropdowns, scroll. Uses ref IDs from snapshot.

title: [Epic] Claude Code Skill
description: SKILL.md for Claude Code integration. Documents all CLI commands with examples. Same pattern as agent-browser skill â€” short commands, ref-based targeting, workflow examples.

title: Plugin: HTTP+WS server with axum
description: Plugin init function that starts axum server on configurable port. WebSocket upgrade for streaming. Basic health check endpoint.

title: Write SKILL.md for Claude Code
description: Document all commands with examples. Same structure as agent-browser skill. Quick start, core workflow, command reference, debugging section.

title: CLI: Backend commands (invoke, state, events, logs)
description: invoke cmd args, state dump, events emit/listen, logs streaming with --level filter. The differentiator vs agent-browser.

title: Workspace setup: Cargo workspace with plugin + CLI crates
description: Set up Rust workspace with crates/tauri-plugin-debug-bridge and crates/tauri-browser. Add shared dependencies.

title: CLI: Interaction commands (click, fill, run-js)
description: click @ref, fill @ref text, run-js expression. All use refs from snapshot. Output formatted for LLM.

title: Plugin: Webview JS execution + screenshot
description: Endpoints for eval (run JS via WebviewWindow::eval), screenshot (capture webview as PNG), and DOM snapshot (inject accessibility tree walker script, return ref-based element list).

title: CLI: Arg parsing with clap + connect command
description: Main binary with clap. connect subcommand to establish HTTP/WS connection to debug bridge. Connection state management.

title: CLI: Snapshot + screenshot commands
description: snapshot -i for interactive elements with refs. snapshot -c for compact. screenshot to stdout or file. Full page support.

title: Plugin: Console + log streaming
description: Capture console.log/warn/error from webview via early JS injection. Capture Rust log/tracing output. Stream both over WebSocket with level filtering.

title: Plugin: Event system (emit, listen, list)
description: Emit Tauri events, list registered listeners, subscribe to events via WebSocket stream.

title: [Epic] tauri-plugin-debug-bridge
description: Tauri plugin that exposes HTTP+WS debug server (port 9229). Provides webview JS execution, screenshots, DOM snapshots, invoke command proxying, state inspection, event system, and log streaming. Dev-only behind a feature flag.

title: Plugin: Invoke command proxy + command listing
description: Endpoint to call any registered Tauri command by name with JSON args, returning the result. Also list all registered commands from generate_handler.

title: Plugin: State inspection + app introspection
description: Dump managed state (Debug trait). List windows/webviews. Return tauri.conf.json. Tray/menu structure dump.

title: [Epic] tauri-browser CLI
description: Rust CLI tool with agent-browser-style UX. Connects to debug bridge via HTTP/WS. Supports snapshot, click, fill, screenshot, invoke, state, events, logs commands. Ref-based element targeting. Output optimized for LLM consumption.
